attributes.action: Create the necessary legislation to enable Stoke-on-Trent to be designated a Special Economic Zone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is necessary to legislate that specific areas within the UK should benefit from special economic assistance in order to promote growth and opportunity through a system of reduced business related taxes and VAT.
Such a scheme should be for a minimum of 5 to 10 years and could be self financing by the overall increased tax receipts following the increased business activity generated by the scheme.  Stoke-on-Trent, often forgotten, should be the first such area to be designated a Special Economic Zone.
